channel.title: webpack on Zxd's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in webpack on Zxd's Blog

item.title: Webpack4升级到5
item.description: 迁移注意 webpack 5 要求至少 Node.js 10.13.0 (LTS) To v5 from v4 升级步骤 1. webpack webpack-cli等升级 1 2 3 4 yarn add webpack@latest -D yarn add webpack-cli@latest -D yarn add html-webpack-plugin@latest -D // yarn add vue-loader@latest @vue/compiler-sfc -D // vue-loader
